QuestData.Title: Dreamcatcher
QuestData.Description:
I cannot hold on for much longer...
I brought a dreamcatcher with me. I was to use it to steal the magic from owlbeast totems.
It is the only way to break the barrier where they hold Keeper Remulos.
Please help where I have failed.
QuestData.LogDescription: Charge the dreamcatcher using owlbeast totems in Lostlight Grotto.
QuestData.RewardText: I knew Leirana... she was one of Remulos' favored, and kindhearted soul. If he has been captured as she believes, we have no time to mourn her passing.
